Description: Numeric code for store type (see separate metadata to the below)
Store ID code (created by Shannon, not USDA)
Method for locating retailer (USDA, ESRI geocoder, Google geocoder, or manual)
Precision of the match--code depends on the method
Includes retailers combined through fuzzy matching
Character version of tract FIPS from NHGIS (https://www.nhgis.org)
